Nuts and Seeds Reduce Aging by Increasing Telomere Length

Nuts and seeds improve signs of biological aging by increasing telomere length. Telomeres, proteins found at the end of each chromosome, preserve information in our genome and prevent cell death; they serve as a biological clock to determine the lifespan of a cell and an organism.
